[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”center” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1621253661916{padding-top: 255px !important;padding-bottom: 255px !important;background-image: url(https://reelfruit.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/image.jpg?id=16336) !important;}” z_index=”” el_class=”overlay”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Our Story

 

We create delightful moments, one snack at a time!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”center” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1614769103841{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;}” z_index=””][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16216″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” qode_css_animation=”element_from_left” qode_hover_animation=”zoom_in” transition_delay=”0.4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][vc_column_text]

Our Mission

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

ReelFruit is on a mission to inspire delightfulness by offering the tastiest snacks in town. We are motivated each and every day to offer the best range of products to our customers across the world.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1616067122936{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” z_index=””][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][vc_column_text]

Transforming Communities

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]We aim to uplift communities by empowering fruit farmers by purchasing their raw materials and adding value to them.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16135″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” qode_css_animation=”element_from_right” qode_hover_animation=”zoom_in” transition_delay=”0.4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1618307441414{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” z_index=””][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16136″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” qode_css_animation=”element_from_left” qode_hover_animation=”zoom_in” transition_delay=”0.4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”80px”][vc_column_text]

Creating Meaningful Work

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]Creating jobs is important to us.
We are building a business that creates meaningful work for young Nigerians so that they can reach their full potential. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”grid” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” css=”.vc_custom_1620769684175{padding-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 150px !important;}” z_index=”” el_class=”no-show”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Our business is built on these 3 pillars:

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_row_inner row_type=”row” type=”full_width” text_align=”left” css_animation=””][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16210″ img_size=”200×200″ alignment=”center” qode_css_animation=”element_from_right” qode_hover_animation=”zoom_in” transition_delay=”0.4″][vc_column_text]

Purposeful Collaboration

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16211″ img_size=”200×200″ alignment=”center” qode_css_animation=”element_from_right” qode_hover_animation=”zoom_in” transition_delay=”0.5″][vc_column_text]

Purposeful Action

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”16212″ img_size=”200×200″ alignment=”center” qode_css_animation=”element_from_right” qode_hover_animation=”zoom_in” transition_delay=”0.6″][vc_column_text]

Inspire Delight

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
